text: You stand at the edge of Kaltvik. Snow crunches beneath your boots. A pale aurora stirs overhead. The wind carries the scent of pine and something metallic.

objects.kaltvik: A remote Alaskan settlement, buried in snow and secrets.
objects.aurora: It flickers in unnatural patterns. You feel watched.

check.success_text: You notice strange disturbances in the snow.
check.fail_text: It just looks like normal windblown snow.
